HOW--HOW MANY MEMBERS WOULD YOU SAY THERE ARE?
translation.ja: メンバーは何人になる？

translation.en: M-M-MEMBERS?
WORLDWIDE?
I THINK A COUPLE OF DOZEN.
REMEMBER THE ONE THAT WOULDN'T STOP HICCUPING?
translation.ja: しゃっくりの止まらない娘…

translation.en: THE WAITRESS FROM OKLAHOMA. EVERY TIME YOU CAME NEAR HER, SHE WOULD CONVULSE INTO HICCUPS.
translation.ja: オクラホマのウエートレス緊張したからでしょう

translation.en: YEAH, I'D... I'D FORGOTTEN. QUITE A NIGHT.
translation.ja: 思い出した散々な夜だったよ

translation.en: YOU KNOW, THE BEST THING OF IT IS THAT...
YOU KNOW... IF YOU'RE SEXUALLY COMPATIBLE... RIGHT FROM THE START.
translation.ja: 体の相性がいいか どうか見極められるからね

translation.en: SHACKLEFORD, WOULD YOU STOP THE CAR?
THANK YOU, JOHN.
GOODBYE. GOODBYE.
HERE.
FOR LUCK.
TAKE CARE OF HIM.
WHAT WAS ALL THAT ABOUT?
I WANTED TO END IT.
SHE NEVER WOULD'VE LOOKED AT ME THEY WAY SHE DID AT HIM.
translation.ja: 彼を見つめる彼女の眼差し

translation.en: SEVEN YEARS AGO, DAVID PROPOSED TO ME ON THE PIER AT PARADISE COVE.
translation.ja: ７年前 プロポーズされたあの埠頭

translation.en: I WANTED TO GO THERE TO REMEMBER... AND START OVER.
translation.ja: あの頃を思い出して再び 出直そう

translation.en: HAVE I EVER TOLD YOU I LOVE YOU?
NO.
I DO.
STILL?
ALWAYS.
